comments: I found him to be a challenging professor but interesting and very knowledgeable. If you work hard, you do well. If you get lazy, you do badly
I enjoyed his 2D class, but would not recommend him as a professor. He is very much a minimalism and does pick favorites. He also wants you to get alot of high quality and expensive materials.

He displays a poor attitude towards what he is doing. Most days he comes to class completely unprepared and just makes things up as he goes along. Sometimes he can be helpful, but many times he is negative and derogatory towards students. He will require you to buy the most expensive paint there is, but half of it will never be used. No book requir
Great teacher, I learned a lot. He has a passion for what he does.
Be ready to shell out some cash, He requires exact supplies but for good reason. He pushes you to be better and even though at first I hated everything I really did improve.
